reviews.cmt: It\'s a very good feature y hay i miss so much!! I just switched from an iPhone to an android os phone and there\'s many things im missing. ..

Have used thus app with both android and apple phones and two different carriers(sprint and verison) same results loses track of distance at times. Also have ran with friends and we would have different distances at the end of a run.

my last two runs were not logged. At the end of each run I got a notice that the app stopped running. I am a new runner and logging my miles and getting new achievements is what keeps me motivated.  Fix it please.
I still love this app.... it has crashed a couple times during runs because I deleted a song it tried to play and I lost my run info a few times now.  :-(

This app was great at first but no longer records the corrdct distance of my runs. As a new runner the app is intended to motivate,  not frustrate. The  ios app allows you to  update your distance, not sure why android is different?! Very frustrated!
Superb app for running .. Does it perfectly whatever it says in description ...  Five stars if i can set personal challenges without inviting friends .

It did say the GPS connectivity is not at its best but everyone since last 3 weeks it gives inaccurate distance. Shows 2km when I had just ran 1.1km(checked in my wife\'s app). And the other time it started moving even faster after first 1km saying another 1km in next 2 min and another in next 1 min. Spoils the miss to run!!!

finally had my first unexpected error when i run 4 miles and got 6 achievement, when i want to check out what are these achievement the app crushed, every single time.  also when do nike plan to update this app, it seems nike running has an update on iOS. please show some respect to android user, update asap.

reviews.t: Needs the same features as iOS
reviews.cmt: So when i first started using Nike+ 5 years ago, they had coaching on the Nike+ website.  Now its only available through Facebook and iPhones. Outside of the differences in the android to ios apps, I love it. The gps tracking, comparing to your friends, pace analysis, its awesome.  Love it.

Just crashes all the time now. Nike support suggested that uninstall and reinstall it. Did that and now it wont even let me login to my profile. Will update my rating only when it comes back online for me. When it worked it was just perfect for what it was. Until it crashed so badly.

I move around a lot and unfortunately in Key West FL my calibration has been severely off despite the fact I subscribe to actual internet service on my phone not just the mercy of wifi!?! Hope you can fix and update this app more regularly since I use it OFTEN!

Where were you all these days my dear Nike running app! I guess the wait for this app was worth it. Now for the review, this app is amazing.  Interface - 5stars  Work info - 5stars. GPS tracking and auto voice info are the best features. All in all its a must have app for workout freaks. Good job Nike :-)

I am currently using the Sony Xperia M and i use the app on a daily basis. It\'s a great app but the distance it says I run as well as the calculations it does are wrong. I would very much like to support you but until this problem is fixed I cannot.
Seems like a pretty cool app. In South Africa - and the majority of the rest of the world, we work with KM. Am I missing something or is there no way of changing this? Pls help.
After the update all my runs are gone. Yet, all my awards from the past are all still there. Used to give it a 4 Star. Just make it right again, Nike!
Motivated to compete against friends.  A little slow between screens.  Had issues not registering where I was... miscalculated some runs.

reviews.t: Buggy as hell after recent updates
reviews.cmt: The app was fine until I updated my phone to android 4.3. Since then the updates for this app have created more and more bugs. Don\'t get me wrong, this app is brilliant when works properly. But,  when it fails to record all of your run because it pauses itself or freezes afterwards it\'s really annoying because I know this app can be great. When it works.

I\'ve been using this app since it was released. I\'ve used both the OIS and the Android versions. I currently have an Android phone but I prefer the OIS version of the app. Some areas have problems with GPS but overall, very good app and I use it every time I run.

The app needs to be updated so that we can still invite people to challenges before they start. It really sucks that we can only send out one invite. Why can\'t I add ppl to a challenge that hasn\'t started???
I reset the password 2 times, I can log in through the web, but not in the app Please help me Please fix this
